parsed.internal_thinking: My second settlement at Node 44 provides Ore (2) and a strong Wheat income (9 and 6). Combined with my first settlement at Node 20 (Wood 11, Brick 6, Sheep 8), I have a full set of resources and a very strong production base on high-probability numbers (6, 8, 9, 11). To capitalize on the high Wheat yield, I need a port. Node 44 has three potential road directions: 43, 45, and 52. Node 52 is the most strategic choice as it sits between two 3:1 ports at Nodes 51 and 53. While Node 52 itself only touches two hexes, it is a vital stepping stone to securing trade flexibility. AI_2 is nearby at Node 42 and has already connected their settlements, but my path to the ports remains clear. I will build towards Node 52 to prepare for early port access. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Secured all five resources with Node 20 (W, B, S) and Node 44 (Wh, O). Focus on upgrading to a city on Node 44 or Node 20 early. Road path is set towards the 3:1 port at Node 51/53 via Node 52. Watch AI_2's expansion from Node 42; they might try to race for the 51 port.
parsed.say_outloud: I'm placing my road towards the coast. With all these resources coming in, I'll definitely need a good port to keep the trade flowing. Good luck to everyone, the board is looking very competitive!
